alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Benton and southeastern Henry Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springville, or 12 miles east of Paris, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden, New Johnsonville, Springville, Big Sandy, Haigler Ridge, Manleyville, Spring Creek and Nathan Bedford Forrest State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
